member.name: T:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.AbstractOleDbSqlServerMetadataCache
member.summary: Class AbstractSqlServerMetadataCache.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.AbstractOleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.GetTableOrView(Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.SqlServerObjectName)
member.summary: Gets the metadata for a table.

member.name: T:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache
member.summary: Class OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.GetScalarFunction(Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.SqlServerObjectName)
member.summary: Gets the metadata for a scalar function.
member.returns: Null if the object could not be found.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.GetScalarFunctions
member.summary: Gets the scalar functions that were loaded by this cache.
member.remarks: Call Preload before invoking this method to ensure that all scalar functions were loaded from the database's schema. Otherwise only the objects that were actually used thus far will be returned.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.GetStoredProcedure(Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.SqlServerObjectName)
member.summary: Gets the stored procedure's metadata.
member.returns: Null if the object could not be found.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.GetStoredProcedures
member.summary: Gets the stored procedures that were loaded by this cache.
member.remarks: Call Preload before invoking this method to ensure that all stored procedures were loaded from the database's schema. Otherwise only the objects that were actually used thus far will be returned.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.GetTableFunction(Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.SqlServerObjectName)
member.summary: Gets the metadata for a table function.
member.returns: Null if the object could not be found.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.GetTableFunctions
member.summary: Gets the table-valued functions that were loaded by this cache.
member.remarks: Call Preload before invoking this method to ensure that all table-valued functions were loaded from the database's schema. Otherwise only the objects that were actually used thus far will be returned.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.GetTableOrViewFromClass``1
member.summary: Returns the table or view derived from the class's name and/or Table attribute.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.GetTablesAndViews
member.summary: Gets the tables and views that were loaded by this cache.
member.remarks: Call Preload before invoking this method to ensure that all tables and views were loaded from the database's schema. Otherwise only the objects that were actually used thus far will be returned.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.GetUserDefinedType(Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.SqlServerObjectName)
member.summary: Gets the metadata for a user defined type.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.GetUserDefinedTypes
member.summary: Gets the table-valued functions that were loaded by this cache.
member.remarks: Call Preload before invoking this method to ensure that all table-valued functions were loaded from the database's schema. Otherwise only the objects that were actually used thus far will be returned.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.Preload
member.summary: Preloads all of the metadata for this data source.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.Reset
member.summary: Resets the metadata cache, clearing out all cached metadata.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.ParseObjectName(System.String)
member.summary: Parse a string and return the database specific representation of the object name.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.#ctor(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.DatabaseName
member.summary: Returns the current database.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.DefaultSchema
member.summary: Returns the user's default schema.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.GetTableOrView(Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.SqlServerObjectName)
member.summary: Gets the detailed metadata for a table or view.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.PreloadScalarFunctions
member.summary: Preloads the scalar functions.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.PreloadStoredProcedures
member.summary: Preloads the stored procedures.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.PreloadTableFunctions
member.summary: Preloads the table value functions.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.PreloadTables
member.summary: Preloads metadata for all tables.
member.remarks: This is normally used only for testing. By default, metadata is loaded as needed.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.PreloadUserDefinedTypes
member.summary: Preloads the user defined types.
member.remarks: This is normally used only for testing. By default, metadata is loaded as needed.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerMetadataCache.PreloadViews
member.summary: Preloads metadata for all views.
member.remarks: This is normally used only for testing. By default, metadata is loaded as needed.

member.name: T:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerEffectiveSettings
member.summary: This contains the connection options that are currently in effect.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerEffectiveSettings.AnsiNullDefaultOff
member.summary: ANSI_NULL_DFLT_OFF. Alters the session's behavior not to use ANSI compatibility for nullability. New columns defined without explicit nullability do not allow nulls.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerEffectiveSettings.AnsiNullDefaultOn
member.summary: ANSI_NULL_DFLT_ON. Alters the session's behavior to use ANSI compatibility for nullability. New columns defined without explicit nullability are defined to allow nulls.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerEffectiveSettings.AnsiNulls
member.summary: ANSI_NULLS. Controls NULL handling when using equality operators.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerEffectiveSettings.AnsiPadding
member.summary: ANSI_PADDING. Controls padding of fixed-length variables.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerEffectiveSettings.AnsiWarning
member.summary: ANSI_WARNINGS. Controls truncation and NULL in aggregate warnings.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerEffectiveSettings.ArithAbort
member.summary: ARITHABORT. Terminates a query when an overflow or divide-by-zero error occurs during query execution.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerEffectiveSettings.ArithIgnore
member.summary: ARITHIGNORE. Returns NULL when an overflow or divide-by-zero error occurs during a query.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerEffectiveSettings.ConcatNullYieldsNull
member.summary: CONCAT_NULL_YIELDS_NULL. Returns NULL when concatenating a NULL value with a string.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerEffectiveSettings.CursorCloseOnCommit
member.summary: CURSOR_CLOSE_ON_COMMIT. Controls behavior of cursors after a commit operation has been performed.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerEffectiveSettings.DisableDeferredConstraintChecking
member.summary: DISABLE_DEF_CNST_CHK. Controls interim or deferred constraint checking.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerEffectiveSettings.NoCount
member.summary: NOCOUNT. Turns off the message returned at the end of each statement that states how many rows were affected.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerEffectiveSettings.NumericRoundAbort
member.summary: NUMERIC_ROUNDABORT. Generates an error when a loss of precision occurs in an expression.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerEffectiveSettings.QuotedIdentifier
member.summary: QUOTED_IDENTIFIER. Differentiates between single and double quotation marks when evaluating an expression.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerEffectiveSettings.XactAbort
member.summary: XACT_ABORT. Rolls back a transaction if a Transact-SQL statement raises a run-time error.

member.name: T:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerOpenDataSource
member.summary: Class SqlServerOpenDataSource.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerOpenDataSource.AssociatedConnection
member.summary: Returns the associated connection.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerOpenDataSource.AssociatedTransaction
member.summary: Returns the associated transaction.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerOpenDataSource.Cache
member.summary: Gets or sets the cache to be used by this data source. The default is .NET's System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCache.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerOpenDataSource.DatabaseMetadata
member.summary: Gets the database metadata.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerOpenDataSource.ExtensionCache
member.summary: The extension cache is used by extensions to store data source specific information.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerOpenDataSource.Close
member.summary: Closes the connection and transaction associated with this data source.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerOpenDataSource.GetExtensionData``1
member.summary: Gets the extension data.
member.typeparam: The type of extension data desired.
member.remarks: Chain extensions can use this to store data source specific data. The key should be a data type defined by the extension. Transactional data sources should override this method and return the value held by their parent data source.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerOpenDataSource.TestConnection
member.summary: Tests the connection.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerOpenDataSource.TestConnectionAsync
member.summary: Tests the connection asynchronously.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerOpenDataSource.TryCommit
member.summary: Tries the commit the transaction associated with this data source.
member.returns: True if there was an open transaction associated with this data source, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerOpenDataSource.WithRules(Tortuga.Chain.AuditRules.AuditRule[])
member.summary: Modifies this data source with additional audit rules.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerOpenDataSource.WithRules(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Tortuga.Chain.AuditRules.AuditRule})
member.summary: Modifies this data source with additional audit rules.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerOpenDataSource.WithUser(System.Object)
member.summary: Modifies this data source to include the indicated user.
member.remarks: This is used in conjunction with audit rules.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerOpenDataSource.Execute(Tortuga.Chain.Core.CommandExecutionToken{System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand,System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter},Tortuga.Chain.Core.CommandImplementation{System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand},System.Object)
member.summary: Executes the specified operation.
member.param: The implementation that handles processing the result of the command.
member.exception: executionToken;executionToken is null. or implementation;implementation is null.

member.summary: Executes the specified operation.
Executes the operation asynchronously.
member.param: The implementation that handles processing the result of the command.

member.summary: Execute the operation asynchronously.

member.name: T:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerTransactionalDataSource
member.summary: Class SqlServerTransactionalDataSource.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerTransactionalDataSource.#ctor(Tortuga.Chain.OleDbSqlServerDataSource,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Data.IsolationLevel},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The isolation level. If not supplied, will use the database default.
If true, logging events are forwarded to the parent connection.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerTransactionalDataSource.#ctor(Tortuga.Chain.OleDbSqlServerDataSource,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection,System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: If true, logging events are forwarded to the parent connection.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerTransactionalDataSource.Cache
member.summary: Gets or sets the cache to be used by this data source. The default is .NET's System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCache.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerTransactionalDataSource.DatabaseMetadata
member.summary: This object can be used to lookup database information.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerTransactionalDataSource.TransactionName
member.summary: Gets the name of the transaction.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerTransactionalDataSource.ExtensionCache
member.summary: The extension cache is used by extensions to store data source specific information.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerTransactionalDataSource.Commit
member.summary: Commits the transaction and disposes the underlying connection.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerTransactionalDataSource.Dispose
member.summary: Closes the current transaction and connection. If not committed, the transaction is rolled back.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerTransactionalDataSource.GetExtensionData``1
member.summary: Gets the extension data.
member.typeparam: The type of extension data desired.
member.remarks: Chain extensions can use this to store data source specific data. The key should be a data type defined by the extension. Transactional data sources should override this method and return the value held by their parent data source.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerTransactionalDataSource.Rollback
member.summary: Rolls back the transaction and disposes the underlying connection.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.OleDbSqlServerTransactionalDataSource.TestConnection
member.summary: Tests the connection.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.OleDbSqlServerDataSource.ArithAbort
member.summary: Terminates a query when an overflow or divide-by-zero error occurs during query execution.
member.remarks: Microsoft recommends setting ArithAbort=On for all connections. To avoid an additional round-trip to the server, do this at the server level instead of at the connection level.

member.summary: This object can be used to lookup database information.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.OleDbSqlServerDataSource.XactAbort
member.summary: Rolls back a transaction if a Transact-SQL statement raises a run-time error.

member.summary: Creates a new transaction
member.param: the isolation level. if not supplied, will use the database default.
if true, logging events are forwarded to the parent connection.
member.remarks: the caller of this function is responsible for closing the transaction.
